body:
love yourself your, oakland 9/12

hey! i’m robyn (ashley irl). i’ll be in attendance to the oakland bts concert on 9/12/18! if anyone else is going message me privately! maybe we can meet up and have a lil meet up with other army!

summary: Чонгук из BTS рассказал о подароке на день рождения от Чимина
title: Чонгук из BTS рассказал о подароке на день рождения от Чимина
excerpt: Чонгук из BTS рассказал о подарке дня рождения от Чимина. 6 сентября Чонгук побеседовал со своими поклонниками через приложение V Naver. Во время трансляции в прямом эфире его спросили о подарках, которые он получил на свой день рождения 1 сентября. Чонгук ответил: «Я получил подарок от Чимин-хёна. Он — фея подарков». Он объяснил: «Черная сумка, […] Сообщение Чонгук из BTS рассказал о подароке на день рождения от Чимина появились сначала на SHOWASIA - ❶ Новости шоу-бизнеса ❖ K-POP, J-POP, C-POP.

i write sometimes;

summary:
Jimin • Jungkook 「your daughter calls him appa」
I’m sorry it took me forever to write this, love:(( i just get a hold of my life...
body:
Jimin • Jungkook 「your daughter calls him appa」

I’m sorry it took me forever to write this, love:(( i just get a hold of my life again. thank you for waiting and i hope you like this💞

  • y/d/n; your daughter name

Jimin

As a single mother, you tried your best to raise your daughter into a kind human being you wanted her to be, and you did. She would let you have the last piece of chicken nuggets she likes so much, she would cook if she had time, she gives the elderly her seat in the train and she respected your boyfriend. You have never tried to hide your relationship with Jimin, and of course, your daughter is not oblivious about that either.

Jimin told you his concern about your daughter being distant to him, thinking that she might not like him. You too, actually thought about that a lot. But one day, that thought just went away.

“Eomma?”

“Yes?”

“Can you attend my school’s autumn festival this Saturday? I’ll be performing.”

“Of course, love.”

“So, I’ll see you there?” you can sense excitement in her tone.

“Yes, you’ll see me there.”

“And also, can you bring along Jimin ahjussi?”

You look at her and give her a pretty weird face before nodding.

“Good,” and she left with a smile on her lips.

Jimin fetches you on your working place that day. The school’s crowded, especially near the stage area. But as a parents to one of the student, you are given a reserved seat.

‘Parents, huh?’ you thought about how happy will your daughter be if her real father can attend this event.

“And let’s welcome y/d/n, to the stage to present her poem!” Everyone clapped their hands. You see your daughter slowly walked up the stairs. She checks the mic before reciting her poem. Her eyes meet yours then she looks left to Jimin.

“To Eomma,” she started. Jimin holds your hand as he knew you are going to cry.

“And to Appa,” she continued. Your heart is broken into pieces when she says that, but with the absence of her appa.

“To Jimin Appa.” Both Jimin and you brought your heads up to see your little princess. You thought you heard it wrong but when she smiles at you, sincerely, you know you heard the right thing.

The poem said it all, how she loves the way you smile when you’re with him. Saying that she is happy if you are happy and that she loves him too. You raise her right, she was never a mistake. Your rested your head on Jimin’s shoulder the whole performance, not knowing what to do when it ends.

“To Jimin Appa, thank you.”

“To Eomma, I am happy too.”

Jungkook

Jungkook and your daughter have bonded through video game, but you know their relationship is more than that. She loves him more than anything and you know it’s the other way around too.

“Ahjussi, you take the left rail, and I’ll take the right one!”

“Roger that commander!” Jungkook giggled at her small instruction.

“Alright there two heroes, food’s ready.” you approached them in the living room, trying to get both of them to eat.

“Wait, eomma. Five minutes.”

“There’s no five minute for you, love. Turn it off and eat your lunch.”

“Arasseo.” she stood up and headed to the dining table.

“She’s obedient thesedays.” Jungkook said walking together with you to the kitchen.

“Better than not, right?”

Lunch with Jungkook is never peaceful, your daughter will have thousands of stories to tell the both of you and you treasure all of them more than anything.

“And, and the dragon save the princess!” Right after her story ends, someone rings the bell. You don’t remember inviting anyone today.

“Can I open the door, eomma?”

“Yes, but I’ll come with you.” Your daughter ran to the front door. She opens it without any hesitation and a figure of a very familiar man come to your sight. Your ex-boyfriend, her father.

Your daughter instantly hid behind you, her small hand grabbing the end of your dress.

“No greetings? Wow, y/n, look what you’ve raised until now? A daughter with no attitude?”

“She doesn’t need to call you anything. She doesn’t owe you anything. What do you want?”

“I’m just here for another visit, and perhaps have a talk with my little princess?” he crouches down to talk to her.

“She’s afraid of you, can’t you see that? Please leave, please.”

“Is this how you treated the biological father of your daughter, y/n? Asking him to go?”

“If you want to talk about the child custody, can we talk some other time?”

“I ain’t got that much time like you do, y/n!” He hold your shoulder, almost crushing it at the same time.

“Eomma!” You tried to make him leaves not just because your daughter is afraid of him, but because Jungkook is here and you didn’t want him to see him. But with the screaming of your daughter, you knew he would come.

“Y/n!”

“Ow, this is the new one, I see.”

“Don’t touch her, let her go.” You could see Jungkook’s eyes threatening him.

“Playing the hero, huh?”

“I said let her go.”

“Please let eomma go!” When your daughter said that, the atmosphere of the room changes.

“So you’re trying to go against appa now?”

“You are not my appa.” she stopped.

“I only have one appa, and it’s Jungkook appa.”

“Appa always plays with me and she makes eomma happy.”

“You are not appa.”

“Wow, y/n, look what you’ve done. My own daughter is betraying me now.”

“And I regret nothing.” Your lips formed a smirk, and he left saying he’ll come back again.

“Eomma, you okay?”

“Yes, I’m okay.” You squat down and hug her.

“You are very brave, y/d/n.” Jungkook complimented her.

“I got it from, appa!”

Both Jungkook and you smile at each other when another ‘appa’ came out of her little lips.

“You love appa that much, huh?”

“I love both of you that much.”

“Can I call ahjussi, appa from now on?” she asked, waiting for you for an answer.

“You asked him.” you answered.

“Can I?” she shifted her eyes to Jungkook.

“How can I say ‘no’ if the commander said so?”

Yes, you’ve never regretted it.

reblog.comment:
Jimin • Jungkook 「your daughter calls him appa」

“So you’re trying to go against appa now?”

“No greetings? Wow, y/n, look what you’ve raised until now? A daughter with no attitude?”

“She doesn’t need to call you anything. She doesn’t owe you anything. What do you want?”

“I’m just here for another visit, and perhaps have a talk with my little princess?” he crouches down to talk to her.

“She’s afraid of you, can’t you see that? Please leave, please.”

“Is this how you treated the biological father of your daughter, y/n? Asking him to go?”

“If you want to talk about the child custody, can we talk some other time?”

“I ain’t got that much time like you do, y/n!” He hold your shoulder, almost crushing it at the same time.

“Eomma!” You tried to make him leaves not just because your daughter is afraid of him, but because Jungkook is here and you didn’t want him to see him. But with the screaming of your daughter, you knew he would come.

“Y/n!”

“Ow, this is the new one, I see.”

“Don’t touch her, let her go.” You could see Jungkook’s eyes threatening him.

“Playing the hero, huh?”

“I said let her go.”

“Please let eomma go!” When your daughter said that, the atmosphere of the room changes.

“So you’re trying to go against appa now?”

“You are not my appa.” she stopped.

“I only have one appa, and it’s Jungkook appa.”

“Appa always plays with me and she makes eomma happy.”

“You are not appa.”

“Wow, y/n, look what you’ve done. My own daughter is betraying me now.”

“And I regret nothing.” Your lips formed a smirk, and he left saying he’ll come back again.

“Eomma, you okay?”

“Yes, I’m okay.” You squat down and hug her.

“You are very brave, y/d/n.” Jungkook complimented her.

“I got it from, appa!”

Both Jungkook and you smile at each other when another ‘appa’ came out of her little lips.

“You love appa that much, huh?”

“I love both of you that much.”

“Can I call ahjussi, appa from now on?” she asked, waiting for you for an answer.

“You asked him.” you answered.

“Can I?” she shifted her eyes to Jungkook.

“How can I say ‘no’ if the commander said so?”

Yes, you’ve never regretted it.
trail.content:
Jimin • Jungkook 「your daughter calls him appa」

I’m sorry it took me forever to write this, love:(( i just get a hold of my life again. thank you for waiting and i hope you like this💞

  • y/d/n; your daughter name

Jimin

As a single mother, you tried your best to raise your daughter into a kind human being you wanted her to be, and you did. She would let you have the last piece of chicken nuggets she likes so much, she would cook if she had time, she gives the elderly her seat in the train and she respected your boyfriend. You have never tried to hide your relationship with Jimin, and of course, your daughter is not oblivious about that either.

Jimin told you his concern about your daughter being distant to him, thinking that she might not like him. You too, actually thought about that a lot. But one day, that thought just went away.

“Eomma?”

“Yes?”

“Can you attend my school’s autumn festival this Saturday? I’ll be performing.”

“Of course, love.”

“So, I’ll see you there?” you can sense excitement in her tone.

“Yes, you’ll see me there.”

“And also, can you bring along Jimin ahjussi?”

You look at her and give her a pretty weird face before nodding.

“Good,” and she left with a smile on her lips.

Jimin fetches you on your working place that day. The school’s crowded, especially near the stage area. But as a parents to one of the student, you are given a reserved seat.

‘Parents, huh?’ you thought about how happy will your daughter be if her real father can attend this event.

“And let’s welcome y/d/n, to the stage to present her poem!” Everyone clapped their hands. You see your daughter slowly walked up the stairs. She checks the mic before reciting her poem. Her eyes meet yours then she looks left to Jimin.

“To Eomma,” she started. Jimin holds your hand as he knew you are going to cry.

“And to Appa,” she continued. Your heart is broken into pieces when she says that, but with the absence of her appa.

“To Jimin Appa.” Both Jimin and you brought your heads up to see your little princess. You thought you heard it wrong but when she smiles at you, sincerely, you know you heard the right thing.

The poem said it all, how she loves the way you smile when you’re with him. Saying that she is happy if you are happy and that she loves him too. You raise her right, she was never a mistake. Your rested your head on Jimin’s shoulder the whole performance, not knowing what to do when it ends.

“To Jimin Appa, thank you.”

“To Eomma, I am happy too.”

Jungkook

Jungkook and your daughter have bonded through video game, but you know their relationship is more than that. She loves him more than anything and you know it’s the other way around too.

“Ahjussi, you take the left rail, and I’ll take the right one!”

“Roger that commander!” Jungkook giggled at her small instruction.

“Alright there two heroes, food’s ready.” you approached them in the living room, trying to get both of them to eat.

“Wait, eomma. Five minutes.”

“There’s no five minute for you, love. Turn it off and eat your lunch.”

“Arasseo.” she stood up and headed to the dining table.

“She’s obedient thesedays.” Jungkook said walking together with you to the kitchen.

“Better than not, right?”

Lunch with Jungkook is never peaceful, your daughter will have thousands of stories to tell the both of you and you treasure all of them more than anything.

“And, and the dragon save the princess!” Right after her story ends, someone rings the bell. You don’t remember inviting anyone today.

“Can I open the door, eomma?”

“Yes, but I’ll come with you.” Your daughter ran to the front door. She opens it without any hesitation and a figure of a very familiar man come to your sight. Your ex-boyfriend, her father.

Your daughter instantly hid behind you, her small hand grabbing the end of your dress.

“No greetings? Wow, y/n, look what you’ve raised until now? A daughter with no attitude?”

“She doesn’t need to call you anything. She doesn’t owe you anything. What do you want?”

“I’m just here for another visit, and perhaps have a talk with my little princess?” he crouches down to talk to her.

“She’s afraid of you, can’t you see that? Please leave, please.”

“Is this how you treated the biological father of your daughter, y/n? Asking him to go?”

“If you want to talk about the child custody, can we talk some other time?”

“I ain’t got that much time like you do, y/n!” He hold your shoulder, almost crushing it at the same time.

“Eomma!” You tried to make him leaves not just because your daughter is afraid of him, but because Jungkook is here and you didn’t want him to see him. But with the screaming of your daughter, you knew he would come.

“Y/n!”

“Ow, this is the new one, I see.”

“Don’t touch her, let her go.” You could see Jungkook’s eyes threatening him.

“Playing the hero, huh?”

“I said let her go.”

“Please let eomma go!” When your daughter said that, the atmosphere of the room changes.

“So you’re trying to go against appa now?”

“You are not my appa.” she stopped.

“I only have one appa, and it’s Jungkook appa.”

“Appa always plays with me and she makes eomma happy.”

“You are not appa.”

“Wow, y/n, look what you’ve done. My own daughter is betraying me now.”

“And I regret nothing.” Your lips formed a smirk, and he left saying he’ll come back again.

“Eomma, you okay?”

“Yes, I’m okay.” You squat down and hug her.

“You are very brave, y/d/n.” Jungkook complimented her.

“I got it from, appa!”

Both Jungkook and you smile at each other when another ‘appa’ came out of her little lips.

“You love appa that much, huh?”

“I love both of you that much.”

“Can I call ahjussi, appa from now on?” she asked, waiting for you for an answer.

“You asked him.” you answered.

“Can I?” she shifted her eyes to Jungkook.

“How can I say ‘no’ if the commander said so?”

Yes, you’ve never regretted it.

summary:
Jungkook - Names Part Two
You stir with a groan, your head absolutely pounding. You’d cried yourself to sleep after losing...
body:
Jungkook - Names Part Two

You stir with a groan, your head absolutely pounding. You’d cried yourself to sleep after losing control, and now you’re paying the price for that. Pulling away, you find yourself stopped by a pair of strong arms. That’s when you tilt your head up and see Jungkook holding you tightly to him, tear tracks staining his cheeks.

You don’t stay in the position long. It takes about 5 seconds for everything to come flooding back to you, and you shove Jungkook away from you, not caring if it wakes him up. You head out to the living room, stopping for only a moment to see a gift bag sitting on the coffee table it has ‘I’M SORRY I’M A MEAN AND JEALOUS BOYFRIEND’ scrawled across the front, but you don’t bother opening it. A gift isn’t going to make up for what Jungkook said and neither are the clean bandages around your wrists that you assume Jungkook put there,

“Wha-“ Jungkook mumbles, sitting up in bed as you leave the room. He doesn’t have a second to see your face, but he knows what it’ll look like. Angry, disappointed, upset… all things that Jungkook knows he deserves to have directed at him. He wishes he could say that he didn’t know what came over him last night, but he does. It’s jealousy. He lets it control his life.

You pointedly ignore Jungkook when he comes into the kitchen, clutching his gift bag and wearing a wounded expression. You don’t know why he is, he’s not the one who was called a ‘prissy spoiled brat’ and an ‘attention whore’. You’re the one hurting, not him. He brought any rage you have upon himself, and it hurts Jungkook that he knows that. He’s not surprised when you don’t bother turning around to face him,

“I bought you a present to try and apologise, but I guess you don’t want it since you left it in the living room,” He says quietly, and you don’t respond. He’s absolutely right, “I don’t think about you, by the way. I was just angry. My anger got the better of me, kinda like when you-“

“No, don’t you dare!” You suddenly spit, whirling around to face Jungkook, anger burning in your eyes and your heart, “Don’t think for even a second that you can compare this to anything I’ve ever done! I would never say things like that to you, not words that I know would break you down like you did to me!” Your voice rises steadily, and Jungkook’s gaze drops to his feet. He should’ve seen that one coming - it was stupid to try and make the situation seem less bad by comparing it to past fights,

“Can’t we just talk about this? I think that would do us more good than shouting and arguing,” Jungkook pleads, eyes lifting up to meet yours again. Bad idea. You don’t look angry like he was expecting. You look like you’re about to cry, and that’s just so much worse,

“I’m too upset right now. Don’t you have dance practice to get to? I need to figure out what I want, and you being here won’t help,” You mutter, walking back to the bathroom to shower off and check your wrists. If Jungkook is going to fly off the handle at you and rip down your self-esteem every time you do something he doesn’t like, you don’t think you can continue being with him.

Jungkook stands in shock in your wake, wondering if he really managed to mess up this badly. Just 24 hours ago, he was making your breakfast and kissing you. Not now.

Masterlist
